title: Colin Moriarty Reviews Oreo Cookies - Oreo Oration
description:
Because you supported us on http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny, Colin Moriarty is here to review the original Oreo Cookie. FYI, he hates cookies.

Get the podcast early here: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_c...

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameover...

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Whenever there's a cool new flavor, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Colin on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Check out the Oreo Oration FAQ: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aO6zw2...

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/col...

Thanks to Nick for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.
